  "Allegations" : "IN FEB. 2006, A VUL POLICY WAS ISSUED TO THE CLIENT FOR A VALUE OF $804,724.  THEN MARCH 2006 THIS POLICY WAS AMENDED TO A INCREASED VALUE OF $1,500,000.00.   "Broker Comment" : "\"IN RESPONSE TO THE STATED ALLEGATIONS, I WHOLEHEARDETLY DISAGREE.  IN MY PROFESSIONAL OPINION THE PRODUCT IN DISPUTE WAS APPROPRIATE FOR THE CLIENT'S OVERALL FINANCIAL PLAN. NOT ONLY DID I MEET WITH THE CLIENT DOZENS OF TIMES TO DISCUSS AND REVIEW THE STRATEGY, THERE WERE NUMEROUS TELEPHONE CALLS, CORRESPONDENCE, AND EMAILS MADE DISCUSSING THE PRODUCT.
